channel.title: Main project insanity things to know!
channel.description:
IK there is a lot of tutorial so please do not flame i just want to help people. first- Creating a NPC. [ul][li]spawn = 1 3280 9170 1 0 0 5 5 man [/li][/ul] what each thing means is 1 is npc id, the 3280 is x coord, 9170 is the y coord,the next 1 is the hieght of the monster.the first 0 is the walking and the 2nd 0 is the max hit of the monster.the 5's are the attack and the defence of the NPC you have created. Lastly the part where it says man is the description of the monster.Now Your Have Created A NPC! Ok now,to create monster rops go to the file called NPCDrops(the TSM file) look at my code for my Steel dragon.
#steel dragon 1592:40 1213:1 1247:1 995:500 560:150 555:150 892:150 805:10 1618:2 1620:2 1622:2 1624:2 11286:1 4585:1 4087:1 112:30 1213:1 1247:1 995:500 560:150 555:150 892:150 805:10 1618:2 1620:2 1622:2 1624:2 2366:1 2677:1
steel dragon is name of npc.the 1592 is the NPC id.the 40 is the percent of rares from it.1213 is one of the item ids i have for a drop.the :1 makes the amout that the dragon will drop. Next I will show you guys how to make an object. look for public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) { Then under that u should see something like this. c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(object id, xcoord, ycoord, direction., 10); This is how you make an object.by the end of irt you should have something like this. c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3104, 3508, 0, 10); Now you have an object!Congratz.Lets move on. to make a portal work after u have created it of course make a code like this. case ####: c.getPA().movePlayer(xcoord, ycoord, hieght); c.sendMessage("What ever u want to say here."); the #'s are the id or the portal. the next thing, to change the buying 10 from the shop go to bankall.java and find this code case 3900: c.getShops().buyItem(removeId, removeSlot, 100); break; see the 100?that used to be a 10 on my server.change that number to whatever you want. Ok i have sadly run out of time atm.i will show you guys more on this tutorial later.hope u like my work.

item.title: Main project insanity things to know!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:8, topic:401222”]No not really…
Suggestion, adding a token
creating an int and Boolean(proper way)

public boolean Boolean1 = false, Boolean2 = false;
Instead of,

public boolean Boolean1 = false; public boolean Boolean2 = false;
Etc…
And for int’s

public int int3, int2, int1;
instead of

public int int3 = 0; public int int2 = 0; public int int1 = 0;[/quote]

i lol’d at that.

Read full topic

No not really…
Suggestion, adding a token
creating an int and Boolean(proper way)

public boolean Boolean1 = false, Boolean2 = false;
Instead of,

public boolean Boolean1 = false; public boolean Boolean2 = false;
Etc…
And for int’s

public int int3, int2, int1;
instead of

public int int3 = 0; public int int2 = 0; public int int1 = 0;
how to append commands(the proper) not if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("WrongAppend") && c.playerRights = #) { // What the command does etc.. }
I can give more.

item.title: Main project insanity things to know!
item.dc:creator: @breaking_benjamin breaking benjamin
item.description:
@breaking_benjamin wrote:

IK there is a lot of tutorial so please do not flame i just want to help people.

first- Creating a NPC.

[ul][li]spawn = 1 3280 9170 1 0 0 5 5 man
[/li][/ul]

what each thing means is
1 is npc id, the 3280 is x coord, 9170 is the y coord,the next 1 is the hieght of the monster.the first 0 is the walking and the 2nd 0 is the max hit of the monster.the 5’s are the attack and the defence of the NPC you have created.
Lastly the part where it says man is the description of the monster.Now Your Have Created A NPC!

Ok now,to create monster rops go to the file called NPCDrops(the TSM file)

look at my code for my Steel dragon.

#steel dragon 1592:40 1213:1 1247:1 995:500 560:150 555:150 892:150 805:10 1618:2 1620:2 1622:2 1624:2 11286:1 4585:1 4087:1 112:30 1213:1 1247:1 995:500 560:150 555:150 892:150 805:10 1618:2 1620:2 1622:2 1624:2 2366:1 2677:1

steel dragon is name of npc.the 1592 is the NPC id.the 40 is the percent of rares from it.1213 is one of the item ids i have for a drop.the :1 makes the amout that the dragon will drop.

Next I will show you guys how to make an object.

look for public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) {
Then under that u should see something like this.
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(object id, xcoord, ycoord, direction., 10);

This is how you make an object.by the end of irt you should have something like this.

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3104, 3508, 0, 10);

Now you have an object!Congratz.Lets move on.

to make a portal work after u have created it of course make a code like this.
case ####:
c.getPA().movePlayer(xcoord, ycoord, hieght);
c.sendMessage(“What ever u want to say here.”);

the #'s are the id or the portal.

the next thing,
to change the buying 10 from the shop go to bankall.java and find this code

		case 3900:
		c.getShops().buyItem(removeId, removeSlot, 100);
		break;

see the 100?that used to be a 10 on my server.change that number to whatever you want.

Ok i have sadly run out of time atm.i will show you guys more on this tutorial later.hope u like my work.

Read full topic
